Package ca.phon.ipa

Class DiacriticFilter

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.visitor.VisitorAdapter<IPAElement>
ca.phon.ipa.DiacriticFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor<IPAElement>
public class DiacriticFilter extends VisitorAdapter<IPAElement>
Visit each element in a IPATranscript and create a new transcript with Diacritics removed.
